keywords.value: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Lincoln Center showed its appreciation to Reynold Levy, its president who stepped down last January, by raising his bonus to $600,000 in 2013.

headline.print_headline: Lincoln Center President Saw Increase in Bonus
headline.main: Lincoln Center President Saw Increase in Bonus

snippet: Lincoln Center showed its appreciation to Reynold Levy, its president who stepped down last January, by raising his bonus to $600,000 in 2013.
abstract: Recent tax filings reveal that former Lincoln Center president Reynold Levy received increased bonus of $600,000 in 2013, his last year with organization, in appreciation of his performance on the job.
